creator: etienne.dysli@unil.ch
text: The packetSize attribute of the AJP connector has been backported from Tomcat 6 into 5.5.21 but it is not documented on http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-5.5-doc/config/ajp.html. Neither is it documented for Tomcat 6 (see http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/config/ajp.html).

creator: markt@apache.org
text: The has been fixed in trunk and proposed for 5.5.x (and 6.0.x).
This has been fixed for 6.0.x and will be in the next release.
creator: markt@apache.org

text: This has been committed to 5.5.x and will be included in 5.5.27 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
